author: China Uncensored
description:
Operation Honey Pot: Paste this emoji 🍯 in your comment below.
A leaked Pentagon draft suggests the US may be shifting focus from China to domestic and regional issues. Some say this means America is giving up on countering Beijing. But is that really the case? Or is Washington just fighting China in new ways?

Want to go deeper than YouTube will let us? Check out our website: https://chinauncensored.tv

title: Pentagon Plan Puts America First — But China Last?
